UnitType.Quote: Curgen was but a student of power. I am the elder. This world is my privelege.
UnitType.Backstory:
Titans are near-godlike beings who ruled Elemental for thousands of years. Little is known of their origin or their history. They form two rival groups, Drednir and Arnor.
This is one of the ancient Drednir - older than even Curgen or his peers. He has been trapped between worlds, wandering the void, for too long. His desire to reach this world and conquer it burns with a resolve only eons of obsession can mold.
And the Forge, despite its resistance, has conferred untold power onto Tiarmand.
Darzomil has waited on this world for untold years. He shall not abandon his purpose.

UnitType.Quote: I will drag you down into endless night and devour your power, your soul and when there is nothing left but sorrow, your body.
UnitType.Backstory:
All dragons are terrible and powerful. All dragons hate the men that have stolen and ruined their world. But Fell Dragons are darker still. They seek the annilation of men, and their desire is so great that they are willing to debase themselves to accomplish it.
Now that the Titans have returned, they know where they will have the most power, and kill the most men - in service to the Drednir.

These Golems were forged from Obsidian by Tiarmand, and enchanted with void rituals to make them impervious to magic, or damage from magical weapons. They are his shield against Elemental's only threat, the channelers.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Let us restore the lands to the peace the Magi had - and without the danger of the Forge.
